room_title: Escape room "The Interview" by Puzzle Theory in Hartford
review: We went with a group of six people to celebrate my birthday and did the Interview. The puzzle was well designed and we had a great time solving it. I liked that we got to take home our magnet ID badge from the escape room. I can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Interview" by Puzzle Theory in Hartford
review: Our whole family worked together on The Interview. Great fun, and so exciting each time you solve a puzzle!

room_title: Escape room "The Interview" by Puzzle Theory in Hartford
review: The first tale in the Dr. X Story, the interview, had enough puzzles and room for 4 to 6 people to have something for everyone. There was a good blend of easy to hard puzzles and if you get stuck staff can provide a clue or hint to help you. If you are looking for something new to do with friends or looking for something to build team work then check out Puzzle Theory. I have done quite a few escape rooms and this one was the best.

room_title: Escape room "The Interview" by Puzzle Theory in Hartford
review: We decided to do an escape room at the request of my stepson. He had seen one done on a TV show and liked the idea. So we dragged my sister and brother-in-law along with us and completed "The Interview". We had an absolute blast and were so excited to solve the puzzle with 28 seconds left. We will definitely return to complete the other rooms. A great activity for when the weather isn't the greatest.

room_title: Escape room "The Interview" by Puzzle Theory in Hartford
review: My Boyfriend and I went with another couple and we had such an amazing time! We completed "The Interview" with just about a minute to spare and only used 2 clues! I cannot wait to go back to try the second room in the Dr.X series! It's a great way to really put your heads together and I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a night out away from the norm! Team "Meow" for the win!
